results.content: Its good knowledge for basic laravel

Although it says Laravel 4, it would be nice to have an update for 5, since it's out for almost a year now.  Or just add text documents with the code changes for 5.  As for the course itself, the instructor is Alex from phpacademy,  need I say more ;-) So if you want to learn the basics of Laravel 4 this is good. It's helpful if you know the basics of OOP and MVC routing to gain a better understanding.

results.content: Excellent course if you have looking to get started with Laravel. Completed this course in about a week doing a few Lectures a day. TIME TO BUILD!

results.content:
This course explains everything you need to build a complete authentication system in Laravel: login/logout, password reset, account activation.
Great course. Helped me immensely. Highly recommended.
Thank you.
results.content_html:

results.content: This is an awesome introduction to laravel!
results.content_html: This is an awesome introduction to laravel!

results.content: So far, Alex has done a great job explaining what we'll be doing and how to set up Laravel.
results.content_html: So far, Alex has done a great job explaining what we'll be doing and how to set up Laravel.

results.content:
The layout of Laravel is well explained - even with limited knowledge, after watching this course I feel able to create a web application. I would love to see the instructor provide additional series covering adding tables, styling etc.
Laravel is such a well designed framework and the instructor does a fantastic job of demonstrating that.
results.content_html:
